mapper.insert: insert source_company( companyId, name, fullName, description, brief, round, roundDesc, companyStatus, fundingType, currency, preMoney, investment, locationId, address, phone, establishDate, logo, source, sourceId, field, subField, tags, headCountMin, headCountMax, verify, createTime) values( #{companyId}, #{name}, #{fullName}, #{description}, #{brief}, #{round}, #{roundDesc}, #{companyStatus}, #{fundingType}, #{currency}, #{preMoney}, #{investment}, #{locationId}, #{address}, #{phone}, #{establishDate}, #{logo}, #{source}, #{sourceId}, #{field}, #{subField}, #{tags}, #{headCountMin}, #{headCountMax}, #{verify}, #{createTime} )
